title: sAmi un sannidhi
sahitya:
sAmi un sannidhi vandEn uDal poruuL sakalamum unakkE tandEn kanda


anupallavi

  bhUmiyil mIdE poruLena madittEn pugazh vaDivElA porpadam tudittEn


caraNam    karaindu karindu un karuNaiyai pADinEn kaninidu kanindu un kazhalinai nADinEn
virandu nI aruLvAi tol vinai tIravE veTri sEr murugA neDu nalam sEravE
